positive_examples: This is an example of gross domestic product.
The gross domestic product demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed gross domestic product in this context.
A typical case of gross domestic product would involve these features.
The concept of gross domestic product applies here.
The total monetary value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders during a specific time period.
negative_examples: This is an example of inflation, not gross domestic product.
This represents economic indicator in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Inflation, or other types of EconomicIndicator

definition: The total monetary value of all goods and services produced within a country annually.
